column3: In  view  of the  above  submissions  made  by  both  Counsel  the  conviction  is
hereby  set  aside  and  the  Registrar  is  directed  hereby  to  remit  the  case
record to the relevant High Court for a  trial de novo.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
s.  DEVIKA DE L.  TENNEKOON, J.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
